meanings.definition: Wedge-shaped writing system used in ancient Mesopotamia.

meanings.sent3: The student tried to write their name in cuniform on the sand, but it kept getting washed away.

meanings.sent5: The teacher used a cuniform tablet to demonstrate how writing evolved over time.
